description:
The Big Five concentrate their attack on Jonouchi in hopes of knocking him out so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone against their entire formidable force!  To make matters worse, the Big Five keep switching their Deck Masters to take advantage of each of their unique abilities!  Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Jonouchi are near the end of the line!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jonouchi Targeted: Team Play for Victory
La fusion des Cinq Grands - 2e partie
Nerawareta Jounouchi: Shouri e no Renkei Play
狙われた城之内 勝利への連係プレー
